verses.verse: It is<WG4851> not<WG3756> expedient<WG4851> for me<WG3427> doubtless<WG1211> to glory<WG2744><WG1063>. I will come<WG2064> to<WG1519> visions<WG3701> and<WG2532> revelations<WG602> of the Lord<WG2962>.

I knew<WG1492> a man<WG444> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> above<WG4253> fourteen<WG1180> years<WG2094> ago<WG4253>, (whether<WG1535> in<WG1722> the body<WG4983>, I cannot<WG3756> tell<WG1492>; or whether<WG1535> out<WG1622> of the body<WG4983>, I cannot<WG3756> tell<WG1492>: God<WG2316> knoweth<WG1492>;) such an one<WG5108> caught up<WG726> to<WG2193> the third<WG5154> heaven<WG3772>.

And<WG2532> I knew<WG1492> such<WG5108> a man<WG444>, (whether<WG1535> in<WG1722> the body<WG4983>, or<WG1535> out<WG1622> of the body<WG4983>, I cannot<WG3756> tell<WG1492>: God<WG2316> knoweth<WG1492>;)

How that<WG3754> he was caught up<WG726> into<WG1519> paradise<WG3857>, and<WG2532> heard<WG191> unspeakable<WG731> words<WG4487>, which<WG3739> it is<WG1832> not<WG3756> lawful<WG1832> for a man<WG444> to utter<WG2980>.
Of<WG5228> such an one<WG5108> will I glory<WG2744>: yet<WG1161> of<WG5228> myself<WG1683> I will<WG2744> not<WG3756> glory<WG2744>, but<WG1508> in<WG1722> mine<WG3450> infirmities<WG769>.

For<WG1063> though<WG1437> I would desire<WG2309> to glory<WG2744>, I shall<WG2071> not<WG3756> be<WG2071> a fool<WG878>; for<WG1063> I will say<WG2046> the truth<WG225>: but<WG1161> now I forbear<WG5339>, lest<WG3361> any man<WG5100> should think<WG3049> of<WG1519> me<WG1691> above<WG5228> that which<WG3739> he seeth<WG991> me<WG3165> to be, or<WG2228> that he heareth<WG191> of<WG5100><WG1537> me<WG1700>.

And<WG2532> lest<WG3363> I should be exalted above measure<WG5229> through the abundance<WG5236> of the revelations<WG602>, there was given<WG1325> to me<WG3427> a thorn<WG4647> in the flesh<WG4561>, the messenger<WG32> of Satan<WG4566> to<WG2443> buffet<WG2852> me<WG3165>, lest<WG3363> I should be exalted above measure<WG5229>.
For<WG5228> this thing<WG5127> I besought<WG3870> the Lord<WG2962> thrice<WG5151>, that<WG2443> it might depart<WG868> from<WG575> me<WG1700>.

And<WG2532> he said<WG2046> unto me<WG3427>, My<WG3450> grace<WG5485> is sufficient<WG714> for thee<WG4671>: for<WG1063> my<WG3450> strength<WG1411> is made perfect<WG5048> in<WG1722> weakness<WG769>. Most gladly<WG2236> therefore<WG3767> will I<WG2744> rather<WG3123> glory<WG2744> in<WG1722> my<WG3450> infirmities<WG769>, that<WG2443> the power<WG1411> of Christ<WG5547> may rest<WG1981> upon<WG1909> me<WG1691>.

Therefore<WG1352> I take pleasure<WG2106> in<WG1722> infirmities<WG769>, in<WG1722> reproaches<WG5196>, in<WG1722> necessities<WG318>, in<WG1722> persecutions<WG1375>, in<WG1722> distresses<WG4730> for<WG5228> Christ's<WG5547> sake<WG5228>: for<WG1063> when<WG3752> I am weak<WG770>, then<WG5119> am<WG1510> I strong<WG1415>.

I am become<WG1096> a fool<WG878> in glorying<WG2744>; ye<WG5210> have compelled<WG315> me<WG3165>: for<WG1063> I<WG1473> ought<WG3784> to have been commended<WG4921> of<WG5259> you<WG5216>: for<WG1063> in nothing<WG3762> am I behind<WG5302> the very chiefest<WG3029> apostles<WG652><WG5228>, though<WG1499> I be<WG1510> nothing<WG3762>.

Truly<WG3303> the signs<WG4592> of an apostle<WG652> were wrought<WG2716> among<WG1722> you<WG5213> in<WG1722> all<WG3956> patience<WG5281>, in<WG1722> signs<WG4592>, and<WG2532> wonders<WG5059>, and<WG2532> mighty deeds<WG1411>.

For<WG1063> what<WG5101> is it<WG2076> wherein<WG3739> ye were inferior<WG2274> to<WG5228> other<WG3062> churches<WG1577>, except<WG1508> it be that<WG3754> I<WG1473> myself<WG846> was<WG2655> not<WG3756> burdensome<WG2655> to you<WG5216>? forgive<WG5483> me<WG3427> this<WG5026> wrong<WG93>.

Behold<WG2400>, the third time<WG5154> I am<WG2192> ready<WG2093> to come<WG2064> to<WG4314> you<WG5209>; and<WG2532> I will<WG2655> not<WG3756> be burdensome<WG2655> to you<WG5216>: for<WG1063> I seek<WG2212> not<WG3756> yours<WG5216>, but<WG235> you<WG5209>: for<WG1063> the children<WG5043> ought<WG3784> not<WG3756> to lay up<WG2343> for the parents<WG1118>, but<WG235> the parents<WG1118> for the children<WG5043>.

And<WG1161> I<WG1473> will very gladly<WG2236> spend<WG1159> and<WG2532> be spent<WG1550> for<WG5228> you<WG5590><WG5216>; though<WG1499> the more abundantly<WG4056> I love<WG25> you<WG5209>, the less<WG2276> I be loved<WG25>.
But<WG1161> be it so<WG2077>, I<WG1473> did<WG2599> not<WG3756> burden<WG2599> you<WG5209>: nevertheless<WG235>, being<WG5225> crafty<WG3835>, I caught<WG2983> you<WG5209> with guile<WG1388>.
Did I make a gain<WG4122><WG3361> of you<WG5209> by<WG1223> any<WG5100> of them<WG846> whom<WG3739> I sent<WG649> unto<WG4314> you<WG5209>?

I desired<WG3870> Titus<WG5103>, and<WG2532> with him I sent<WG4882> a brother<WG80>. Did<WG4122><WG3387> Titus<WG5103> make a gain<WG4122> of you<WG5209>? walked we<WG4043> not<WG3756> in the same<WG846> spirit<WG4151>? walked we not<WG3756> in the same<WG846> steps<WG2487>?

Again<WG3825>, think ye<WG1380> that<WG3754> we excuse ourselves<WG626> unto you<WG5213>? we speak<WG2980> before<WG2714> God<WG2316> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547>: but<WG1161> we do all things<WG3956>, dearly beloved<WG27>, for<WG5228> your<WG5216> edifying<WG3619>.

For<WG1063> I fear<WG5399>, lest<WG3381><WG4458>, when I come<WG2064>, I shall<WG2147> not<WG3756> find<WG2147> you<WG5209> such as<WG3634> I would<WG2309>, and that I<WG2504> shall be found<WG2147> unto you<WG5213> such as<WG3634> ye would<WG2309> not<WG3756>: lest<WG3381><WG4458> there be debates<WG2054>, envyings<WG2205>, wraths<WG2372>, strifes<WG2052>, backbitings<WG2636>, whisperings<WG5587>, swellings<WG5450>, tumults<WG181>:

And lest<WG3361>, when I come<WG2064> again<WG3825>, my<WG3450> God<WG2316> will humble<WG5013> me<WG3165> among<WG4314> you<WG5209>, and<WG2532> that I shall bewail<WG3996> many<WG4183> which<WG3588> have sinned already<WG4258>, and<WG2532> have<WG3340> not<WG3361> repented<WG3340> of<WG1909> the uncleanness<WG167> and<WG2532> fornication<WG4202> and<WG2532> lasciviousness<WG766> which<WG3739> they have committed<WG4238>.
